<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Renewing Quills](/Feats.aspx?ID=2837) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Shisk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=382" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [The Mwangi Expanse](/Sources.aspx?ID=89) pg. 125 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Quillcoat Shisk](/Heritages.aspx?ID=180) heritage

</column>

---

Your spines grow back much faster than other shisks. You can use the Barbed Quills reaction once every 10 minutes.
name: Renewing Quills
